articles.title: SEC directs Georgia, Tennessee to 'postpone' college football series with Sooners given Oklahoma's upcoming conference move
articles.description: Given Oklahoma's upcoming move to the SEC, along with Texas, the SEC announced on Wednesday it directed Georgia and Tennessee to postpone their series with the Sooners.
articles.content:
Two high profile non-conference series have been scuttled due to the impending departure of Oklahoma and Texas to the SEC, which is scheduled for 2025.

articles.title: Glenavon’s Christopher Atherton, 13, becomes youngest senior footballer in UK
articles.description: Northern Irish schoolboy Christopher Atherton became the youngest senior footballer in the United Kingdom on Tuesday night aged just 13.
articles.content:
Northern Irish schoolboy Christopher Atherton became the youngest senior footballer in the United Kingdom on Tuesday night aged just 13.
